channel.title: Freezes? (pi)
channel.description:
this has been happening for awhile but when i try to add a custom and i spawn it the client freezes and shows this error?
Reality: Loading...
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -125 at Model.method479(Model.java:1044) at ItemDef.method201(ItemDef.java:1394) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:1283) at client.drawInterface(client.java:8390) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1904) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8185) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8932) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4696) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)

item.title: Freezes? (pi)

@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

the number -125 is wrong
if itemdef.java is the only thing you have changed
